statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_platform
SELECT id, regulation, audit_status FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_status = 'Passed'
SELECT regulation, audit_date FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_status = 'Pending'
SELECT id, audit_date, audit_status FROM compliance_platform ORDER BY audit_date DESC
SELECT regulation, audit_status FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_status = 'Passed';
SELECT id, regulation, audit_status FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_status = 'Failed';
SELECT regulation, audit_date FROM compliance_platform WHERE audit_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT id, regulation, audit_date, audit_status FROM compliance_platform WHERE regulation LIKE 'ISO%' OR regulation LIKE '%HIPAA%';
SELECT id, regulation, audit_date, audit_status FROM compliance_platform ORDER BY audit_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed';
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_type = 'Compliance';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_type FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_type = 'Compliance' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description, created_at FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(requirement_id) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_type = 'Legal';

SELECT audits.audit_date, audits.auditor_name, regulatory_requirements.requirement_name FROM audits INNER JOIN regulatory_requirements ON audits.requirement_id = regulatory_requirements.requirement_id WHERE audits.audit_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY audits.audit_date;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, deadline FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE auditor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT check_id, result FROM compliance_checks WHERE result = 'Pass';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'HIPAA Compliance'
SELECT requirement_name, deadline FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC

SELECT compliance_checks.check_id, compliance_checks.result, audits.audit_date FROM compliance_checks JOIN audits ON compliance_checks.audit_id = audits.audit_id WHERE result = 'Failed' ORDER BY audits.audit_date ASC
SELECT audit_date, audit_id FROM audits WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe' AND audit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT r.requirement_name, c.result, a.audit_date FROM compliance_checks c JOIN audits a ON c.audit_id = a.audit_id JOIN regulatory_requirements r ON c.requirement_id = r.requirement_id ORDER BY a.audit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements;
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM RegulatoryRequirements;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_type = 'Internal';
SELECT officer_name, company_name FROM ComplianceOfficers ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT officer_name, audit_date, result FROM ComplianceOfficers JOIN Audits ON ComplianceOfficers.officer_id = Audits.audit_id;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE requirement_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Audits WHERE audit_type = 'Financial Audit';
SELECT officer_name, company_name FROM ComplianceOfficers WHERE officer_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM Audits;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, due_date FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE due_date > '2022-10-31';
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT audits.audit_id, audits.audit_date, users.username FROM audits JOIN users ON audits.auditor = users.username WHERE audits.audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT compliance_records.status, regulatory_requirements.requirement_name FROM compliance_records JOIN regulatory_requirements ON compliance_records.requirement_id = regulatory_requirements.requirement_id WHERE compliance_records.status = 'Pending';
SELECT users.username, user_logs.action, user_logs.timestamp FROM user_logs JOIN users ON user_logs.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.role = 'Admin';
